name: Fortnight
description:
Fortnight is a purposefully-small experimental studio of thinkers, makers and experienced product designers. We unify the process beyond integration.

Research. Strategic thinking. Branding. Smart content creation. Whatever you need, our team works collaboratively to deliver the best in print, digital, space and object design.

team.title: Director
team.name: Rico Rauch
team.bioHtml: Director at Fortnight Limited, a purposefully-small experimental studio of creative thinkers, makers and product designers.

team.title: Business Development Manager
team.name: Rustum Mathias
team.bioHtml: Connecting dreams with opportunities - A well-educated Sales and Business Development professional with a total of 11 years of professional work experience.

team.title: Product Manager & Producer
team.name: Rob Abrahams
team.bioHtml: Product, UX/UI Design enthusiast. Entrepreneur and growth specialist. Fortnight Studio champion.

jobs.title: Mobile Software Developer
jobs.description:
As an ideal candidate you’ll thrive in a small team working together to solve difficult problems and build great features in a cross-functional team. We are a very transparent company and we’re all leaders, responsible for our shared goals.

- As an Mobile engineer we expect you to show proficiency with Swift, React Native and Cocoa Touch.
- Know your way around different architectural patterns used in iOS.
- Build iOS applications from scratch & iOS libraries that can be shared across applications.
- Have experience with API design and development, familiarity with AWS is a plus.
- Knack for benchmarking and optimisation.
- Practical experience with TDD / BDD.
- Experience with databases (SQL, NoSQL, GraphQL, DynamoDB)
- Experience with Git, including understanding of branching and merging workflow

Nice to have

- Working knowledge of JavaScript and React / ReactNative.
- Experience with deploying, hosting, securing, monitoring and scaling in the cloud (Google Cloud Platform or AWS) and experience with configuration management tools (Terraform, Chef, Puppet, etc.)
- A good eye for design and a perfectionist attitude as you’ll be working closely with our designers.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
As an ideal candidate you’ll thrive in a small team working together to solve difficult problems and build great features in a cross-functional team. We are a very transparent company and we’re all leaders, responsible for our shared goals.

  • As an Mobile engineer we expect you to show proficiency with Swift, React Native and Cocoa Touch.
  • Know your way around different architectural patterns used in iOS.
  • Build iOS applications from scratch & iOS libraries that can be shared across applications.
  • Have experience with API design and development, familiarity with AWS is a plus.
  • Knack for benchmarking and optimisation.
  • Practical experience with TDD / BDD.
  • Experience with databases (SQL, NoSQL, GraphQL, DynamoDB)
  • Experience with Git, including understanding of branching and merging workflow

Nice to have

  • Working knowledge of JavaScript and React / ReactNative.
  • Experience with deploying, hosting, securing, monitoring and scaling in the cloud (Google Cloud Platform or AWS) and experience with configuration management tools (Terraform, Chef, Puppet, etc.)
  • A good eye for design and a perfectionist attitude as you’ll be working closely with our designers.
